ai-thag1.35:1.1_0: Seeking happiness, they find it through this practice.
ai-thag1.35:1.2_0: They get a good reputation and grow in fame,
ai-thag1.35:1.3_0: those who develop the direct route:
ai-thag1.35:1.4_0: the noble eight-fold path for realizing the deathless.
ai-thag1.35:1.5_0: a senior ascetic who is a senior. ...
